content: Chess players are ideal women: they can spend hours in silence, follow the maneuvers well and get to know many interesting positions.
translations: ita:Le donne ideali sono le giocatrici di scacchiï¹• possono passare ore in silenzio, seguire bene le manovre e conoscere molt
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
